text: Jammu is a city in Jammu and Kashmir, India. It is on the banks of the Tawi River which is a tributary of the Chenab River. The Dogri language is spoken here among Muslims, Hindus and Sikhs. There is an archeological site called Manda in Jammu. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Cities in Jammu and Kashmir Category:Capital cities in India
title: Jammu
